title: Buffalo Bills finalize 2025 coaching staff
snippet: Full list of Bills coaches and coordinators for the 2025 NFL season

title: Sean McDermott - Wikipedia
snippet: McDermott was nominated for NFL Head Coach of the Year for the 2019 season after leading the Bills to a 10–6 record, receiving their second playoff berth in three seasons as the #5-seed in the AFC. The Bills would lose 22–19 to the Houston Texans in overtime during the Wild Card Round despite a 16–0 third quarter lead. On August 12, 2020, McDermott signed a contract extension through 2025...
